name: unity-wallet
description: Unity Wallet (Creat React Native + React Native Web + Electron)

scripts.desktop: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none yarn web" "wait-on http://localhost:8181 && electron ."
scripts.desktop:build: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -mwl --publish never"
scripts.desktop:build-m: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -m --publish never"
scripts.desktop:build-w: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -w --publish never"
scripts.desktop:build-l: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -l --publish never"
scripts.desktop:deploy: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -mwl --publish always"
scripts.desktop:deploy-m: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -m --publish always"
scripts.desktop:deploy-w: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -w --publish always"
scripts.desktop:deploy-l: concurrently "rm -rf build && yarn web:build" "wait-on build/index.html && npx electron-builder -l --publish always"
scripts.android:build-w: mkdir android\app\build\intermediates\assets\debug && react-native bundle --dev false --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/build/intermediates/assets/debug/index.android.bundle --assets-dkiokjnhjhynest ./android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/debug && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.android:clear: rm -rf android\.gradle android\app\src\main\assets\index.android.bundle && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && gradlew clean cleanBuildCache && cd ..
scripts.clear: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-*; watchman watch-del-all; rm -rf build/ & rm -rf node_modules/; yarn cache clean --force; yarn install
scripts.clear-w: rm -rf build node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock yarn-error.log
